intro_only_event_orchid1_present/4901_12:
Bonjour, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You look like you’re at the top of your game!

Well, hello there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Thanks to you and Blue here, I’ll be battling in
the PML!

I’ve been looking forward to our team battles
so much. I haven’t felt this excited in a very
long time!

Will you be heading out now?
Why don’t we go together?
intro_only_event_orchid1_present/4901_03: Of course! The more the merrier!
intro_only_event_orchid1_present/4901_04: Hoho! Well, that just makes me even more excited!

Take it easy, Gramps! You’ll hurt yourself if you
don’t calm down.

Wha—! You forgot me?!
I’m Professor Oak! People refer to me as the...

Calm down, Gramps!
[Name:PlayerNickname ] is just kidding!
intro_only_event_orchid1_present/4901_12:
Yeah yeah, I hear you, Red! All right—the two
of us are gonna go do our own thing!

See you later, Gramps and
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I can’t wait
to battle you guys in the PML!
Look at how big he’s gotten!
He and Red must still be training together.

You remind me of the two of them the day they
set off from my lab, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Anyway... We should head out ourselves.
intro_only_event_orchid1_present/6001_10:
Gramps and Mew...
They’re gonna be
tough to beat!
intro_only_event_orchid1_present/6001_12:
Who woulda thought that Gramps would become
partners with a Mythical Pokémon!

Gramps might be my biggest obstacle yet, but
you better believe I’m still gonna win!
intro_only_event_orchid1_present/6002_10:
Look at all these different
sync pairs!
intro_only_event_orchid1_present/6002_12:
Seeing all the sync pairs gathered around here just
reminded me of how I partnered up with Mew.

If Blue and Agatha hadn’t been there to give me
that push, I might not have been able to become
partners with Mew in the first place!

Of course, I’m also grateful to you for helping me
look for it!
